typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as integer,
		KUNNR as string,
		ANRED as string,
		ADRNR as string,
		NAME1 as string,
		MCOD1 as string,
		MCOD3 as string,
		TELF1 as string,
		LAND1 as string,
		STRAS as string,
		PSTLZ as string,
		ORT01 as string,
		ORT02 as string,
		REGIO as string,
		HASHKEY_BK as string,
		HASHKEY_DATA as string,
		CREATED_ON as timestamp,
		SOURCE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CLEANSE.KUNDE',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceCleanseKunde
source(output(
		CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK as string,
		CKUN_MANDT as string,
		CKUN_KUNNR as string,
		CKUN_ANRED as string,
		CKUN_ADRNR as string,
		CKUN_NAME1 as string,
		CKUN_MCOD1 as string,
		CKUN_MCOD3 as string,
		CKUN_TELF1 as string,
		CKUN_LAND1 as string,
		CKUN_STRAS as string,
		CKUN_PSTLZ as string,
		CKUN_ORT01 as string,
		CKUN_ORT02 as string,
		CKUN_REGIO as string,
		CKUN_HASHKEY_BK as string,
		CKUN_HASHKEY_DATA as string,
		CKUN_CREATED_ON as string,
		CKUN_SOURCE as string,
		CKUN_VALID_FROM as string,
		CKUN_VALID_TO as string,
		CKUN_CURRENT_FLAG as string,
		CKUN_DML_STRAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CORE.DIM_KUNDE',
	format: 'query') ~> coreDimKunde
filterActiceRows aggregate(MAXSK = max(toInteger(CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK))) ~> coreDimKundeMaxSk
sourceCleanseKunde, filterActiceRows lookup(MANDT == toInteger(CKUN_MANDT)
	&& KUNNR == CKUN_KUNNR,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lookup
lookup split(!isNull(CKUN_HASHKEY_BK) && notEquals(CKUN_HASHKEY_DATA, HASHKEY_DATA),
	isNull(CKUN_HASHKEY_BK),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(updateRows, newRows, doNothing)
ConditionalSplit1@updateRows derive(CURRENT_FLAG = 'N',
		VALID_TO = currentTimestamp(),
		DML_STRAT = 'HIST_UPD') ~> derivedColForUpdatedRow
derivedColForUpdatedRow alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> alterRowforUpdate
ConditionalSplit1@newRows keyGenerate(output(SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> createSk
createSk, coreDimKundeMaxSk join(SK == MAXSK || true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinOnMaxKey
joinOnMaxKey derive(NEWSK = SK + MAXSK,
		VALID_FROM = currentTimestamp(),
		VALID_TO = toTimestamp('2999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		DML_STRAT = iif(notEquals(CKUN_HASHKEY_DATA, HASHKEY_DATA), 'HIST_INS', 'INS'),
		SOURCE = 'CLEANSE.KUNDE',
		CREATED_ON = currentTimestamp(),
		CURRENT_FLAG = 'Y') ~> derivedColForNewRows
derivedColForNewRows alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> alterRowforInsert
coreDimKunde filter(CKUN_CURRENT_FLAG == 'Y') ~> filterActiceRows
alterRowforUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK,
		CKUN_VALID_TO = VALID_TO,
		CKUN_CURRENT_FLAG = CURRENT_FLAG,
		CKUN_DML_STRAT = DML_STRAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> targetUpdateCoreDimKunde
alterRowforInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CKUN_DIM_KUNDE_SK = NEWSK,
		CKUN_MANDT = MANDT,
		CKUN_KUNNR = KUNNR,
		CKUN_ANRED = ANRED,
		CKUN_ADRNR = ADRNR,
		CKUN_NAME1 = NAME1,
		CKUN_MCOD1 = MCOD1,
		CKUN_MCOD3 = MCOD3,
		CKUN_TELF1 = TELF1,
		CKUN_LAND1 = LAND1,
		CKUN_STRAS = STRAS,
		CKUN_PSTLZ = PSTLZ,
		CKUN_ORT01 = ORT01,
		CKUN_ORT02 = ORT02,
		CKUN_REGIO = REGIO,
		CKUN_HASHKEY_BK = HASHKEY_BK,
		CKUN_HASHKEY_DATA = HASHKEY_DATA,
		CKUN_CREATED_ON = CREATED_ON,
		CKUN_SOURCE = SOURCE,
		CKUN_VALID_FROM = VALID_FROM,
		CKUN_VALID_TO = VALID_TO,
		CKUN_CURRENT_FLAG = CURRENT_FLAG,
		CKUN_DML_STRAT = DML_STRAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> targetInsertCoreDimKunde
